titles.title: Mountaintown National Scenic Area Act of 2007
To establish the Mountaintown National Scenic Area in the Chattahoochee National Forest, Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 11/6/2007--Introduced. Mountaintown National Scenic Area Act of 2007 - Establishes the Mountaintown National Scenic Area in the Chattahoochee National Forest in Georgia. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to develop a management plan for the Scenic Area as an amendment to the land and resource management plan for the Forest.
